name: @jexop/core
description: Evaluate expressions with operators that are represented purely JSON objects
author: Greg Bacchus

scripts.build: rimraf dist/*; tsc -b ./tsconfig.amd.json ./tsconfig.cjs.json ./tsconfig.esm.json ./tsconfig.umd.json && mv dist/cjs/index.js dist/cjs/index.cjs && mv dist/esm/index.js dist/esm/index.mjs;
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:types && npm run lint:unused-exports
